attributes.action: Stop using "Green taxes" as an excuse to raise money and guarantee any money raise by green taxes is spent ONLY on green projects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should not be allowed to raise taxes under the green tax label unless its spending the money on green projects such as wind farms, public transport or carbon offsetting.

I think its disgusting that our green taxes are used as general taxable income by the government

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
